faq.title: Common questions before making a website

items.question: Do I need to have all the copy ready before we start?
items.answer: No. Bring drafts or notes and we can work through them together.

items.question: Do I need a professional logo and photos?
items.answer: If you have them, great. If not, we can start with simple typographic design and placeholders.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: It depends on scope. A simple landing can be ready in three days after we finalize the map and copy.

items.question: Will I be able to update small things myself?
items.answer: Yes, we provide a basic guide so you can edit simple text or swap sections later.

items.question: Does this include domain, hosting and email?
items.answer: We guide you choosing and configuring those services, but their cost is separate.

about.title: A small studio that cares about details
paragraphs: Varena is a small web studio with a tight-knit team. That means direct communication and time to understand how you work.
We avoid unnecessary effects and technical jargon, focusing on translating your work into ordered blocks and clear copy.
